The graph of $ y = x^6 - 10x^5 + 29x^4 - 4x^3 + ax^2$ lies above the line $ y = bx + c$ except at three values of $ x$, where the graph and the line intersect. What is the largest of those values?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 4 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 5 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 6 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 7 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 8$
